articles.author: Ritesh Presswala
articles.title: LIC’s margins surprises street; JM Financial sees strong H2, maintains ‘Buy’ on stock with Rs 1,111 target
articles.description: LIC stock edged higher after the insurer reported stronger-than-expected margins of 17.6% in 1H FY26, prompting JM Financial to reiterate its ‘Buy’ rating with a Rs 1,111 target. Analysts expect margin resilience, product diversification, and potential GST ta…
articles.content: Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) impressed investors with stronger-than-expected profitability for the first half of FY26, prompting JM Financial to reiterate its "Buy" rating on the stock w… [+3142 chars]
